item.title: Goal-Space Planning with Subgoal Models
item.description: We propose a long-horizon background-planning algorithm for online RL. This used subgoal models (abstract in state & time) for faster long-term decision making & smarter value propagation.

item.title: QuirkyMaths
item.description: A collection of videos on my favourite physics and maths concepts.

item.title: RHapTor: Rendering Haptic Torques for Virtual Reality
item.description: We augment a virtual reality headset to include two motor-driven discs, which induce a controllable gyroscopic torque on the wearer’s head.

item.title: Abstracting Science: Do the ends justify the means?
item.description:
Should we really believe that a cat can be both dead and alive because ‘science’ told us so?

Are you telling me that everything we ever have and ever will see in this gigantic Universe was once squashed into a point smaller than an atom?

When we try to look into the scientific reasoning and explanations for why these absurd conclusions could be true, they’re often shrouded in a black box of equations and jargon that really doesn’t feel like it’s worth the time to understand completely. At least that’s how I feel about my reading assignments.

item.title: Explore ML
item.description: This beginner course presents introduces neural networks for supervised learning.

item.title: List of Irregular Verbs Across Romance Languages
item.description: This dataset contains all irregular verbs in known Romance languages.
